question.body: An ion can be best described as which of the following:

multiple_choice.choice: An atom with an altered number of electrons

response.feedback: Correct. Atoms become charged when the number of electrons.
Incorrect. Electron loss or gain changes an atom into an ion, but these species are more than just electrons.
Incorrect. Ions are defined by charge not size. Some ions can be quite big.
Incorrect. Ions can have either positive (Na+) or negative (Cl-) charges.

part.hint: Ions are atoms or molecules with an altered charge.
Atomic charge is altered by changing the number of electrons.
